document.full_text: heikh, egypt  - former egyptian president hosni mubarak's health is stable but has not improved, and there are no plans for now to move him from the red sea resort of sharm el-sheikh, an army source said on thursday.
document.title: condition of egypt's mubarak stable: source
lines_and_colors: heikh, egypt  - former egyptian president hosni mubarak's health is stable but has not improved, and there are no plans for now to move him from the red sea resort of sharm el-sheikh, an army source said on thursday.
